```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)

dat = read.csv('data/processed/expenditures_and_PIT.csv')
attach(dat)

head(dat)

# Sample data frame

standardize(col){
  newcol = (col - mean(col)) / sd(col)
  return(newcol)
}

dat_standard = dat |>
  mutate(across(c(a, b), standardize))

```

```{r linreg}
model = lm(Unsheltered.PEH ~ City + Year + Population + Program + Amount)
AIC(model)

model2 = lm(Unsheltered.PEH ~ Population + Program + Amount)
AIC(model2)

model3 = lm(Unsheltered.PEH ~ City + Year + Program)
AIC(model3)

model4 = lm(Unsheltered.PEH ~ City + Year + Population + Program)
AIC(model4)

model5 = lm(Unsheltered.PEH ~ City + Population + Program + Amount)
AIC(model5)

model6 = lm(Unsheltered.PEH ~ City + Program + Amount)
AIC(model6)

model7 = lm(Unsheltered.PEH ~ City + Population + Program)
AIC(model7)


# Winner
summary(model5)
```

```{r coeff_analysis}
desc(model5$coefficients^2)
```
